message.body: Omg I just had the most horrible dream about you.
You were just really cruel in it, nothing like how you are in real life. I think my subconscious thinks that women are evil as I often have dreams like this,
I dunno, I'm pretty mean in real life. That sounds terrible! Maybe your subconscious is telling you to stop sleeping in the middle of the day.
Maybe. Did you decide if you are staying in Tucson to work over the summer or not?
I am! We've been made ACTUAL "student leads" and got a raise. Leaving at the end of july.
